sentences: Kirjansivut ovat kirjan etu- ja takakannet.
context: The Finnish word 'sivu' has several related meanings. Most commonly, it refers to a page of a document or book ('kirjan sivu'). It can also mean the side of something, such as the side of a building or object. In some contexts, it may refer to margins on a page or edges/sides of objects. The word is neutral in tone and widely used in everyday Finnish language.
